name: Hard Candy 1 Quiz / Test | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the first lifesaver flavor?
In M and M candies what color did the blue replace in 1995?
questions.explanation:
Tan.

	Tan got the most votes for replacement.

questions.text: According to the ad what candy bar is 'fluffy, not stuffy'?
What candy bar is 'packed with peanuts' on the inside?

What candy bar was 'a joy to eat'?
What candy company introduced the Symphony Bar in 1998?
(True or False) Candy is basically divided into two kinds, hard and soft?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Based on the fact that sugar goes through different stages from soft to hard.

questions.text: In what year was the first candy bars sold in baseball parks?
(True or False) Hershey Foods Corporation is the largest producer of chocolate in the United States?
questions.explanation:
T & True.
